Articles.Content: Can anyone confirm if current release of PartTools works/does not work with Unity 4.2.2??? I had tried to upgrade and test, thought it didnt work...turns out my part tools was corrupt. But it caused alot of chaos, and I lost a bit of work gettin back to 4.1 and good PartTools. So kinda warry to try it again without a bit of confirmation.

I've personnally never experienced any issues. Just followed the instructions on upgrading part tools and that was it. I'm on my phone so I can't get into specifics atm - rebuilding my computer. But it seems like exporting and proptools/internals worked fine.
ive been using it for a while, it works. I did botch a project merge and loss my prefab setups, but that was my fault.
Thanks fellas, guess Ill give 4.2.2 a go again...gonna make backups first this time thought lol.
